DESCRIPTION: Sealed cards remain in the discard pile when you shuffle and are un-sealed. Sealing a card triggers any exhaust or discard effects listed on the card.
Some Curses can be Cleansed by fulfilling the condition on the card. When fulfilled, the curse can be replaced with your choice of card from another class.
When Blighted exceeds an enemy's current HP, it will be killed and transformed into a special card. Blighted enemies will heal 10% of their missing HP each turn.
Opposite of Vulnerable. Decreases Damage taken by 25%
Opposite of Weak. Increases Damage dealt by 25%
Opposite of Frail. Increases Block gained by 25%
Your Attacks deal double damage but cost 1 more.
When entering this stance, gain [E] [E] . Exiting this stance ends your turn.
Orb: Increases potency each turn. When #yEvoked, draws cards.
Orb: Draws curses each turn. When #yEvoked, Awakens a card.
Channels a different Orb depending on the rarity of the Sealed Card: NL Common: Lightning NL Uncommon: Frost NL Rare: Plasma NL Status: Sludge NL Curse: Dreg
Awoken attacks deal more Damage; awoken skills grant more Block or have more potent effects. NL A card can be Awakened more than once.
